title: Drawing, Design for Chest of Drawers in Mahogany with Neo-Classical Motifs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Chest of Drawers in Mahogany with Neo-Classical Motifs
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper right of design with arrow pointing to corner of chest top: carved; lower right of sheet: CHEST OF DRAWERS OF MAHOGANY / WITH PAINTED DECORATION OR INLAID; along left edge of design, below center, and right, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular 5-drawer chest with carved top edge and painted or inlaid neoclassical decoration at front consisting of tied ribbons, laurel leaf garlands, fruit baskets, rinceaux, etc.; raised on short tapering legs.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Chest of Drawers in Mahogany with Neo-Classical Motifs, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-201
